project.name: Python
project.description: The Python project maintains ebuilds for the Python language itself and a lot of other packages using it.

longdescription.p: The Python project maintains dev-lang/python and most of dev-python/.

Add setuptools-enabled ebuilds to the tree once setuptools has sufficiently stabilized. Possibly add a way to install things from pypi without having to write an ebuild by hand. Add a way to install "raw" eggs if something really requires this.
